main: ^Apple, wasn’t that last battle awesome? We crushed that ‘shroom!
^It was a good fight! You did well out there Lemon.
^The enemy was comin’ at us and we charged right in, I went all “zap zap” and they were so stunned!
^It was awesome! And then when the ‘shroom retaliated, Strawberry patched you up so quick you didn’t even know something hit you.
^And then Blueberry saw an opening after the attack and lobbed their Berry Bombs right at them!

s: ^And of course our leader Apple dealt the killing blow!
^Couldn't have done it without my opening stun

good: ^Oh no, I didn't do that much.
^Are you kidding? It was amazing, you cleaved right through him! Wouldn't expect anything less from out captain.
^Well geez Lemon, thats real nice of you. It was a great team effort that's for sure.
^And it wouldn’t be this team without you leading the way Apple! We couldn’t be doing any of this if you hadn’t brought us together
bad: ^The look on that guy’s face, he was shaking in his boots! Shaking from electricity that is, on account of me zappin him.
^For sure! I’m proud of you dude.
